description:
Tsumugi has a problem: she finds doughnuts difficult.  Are they a snack? Are they a meal?  She finds the answer when Kotori and her father make homemade doughnuts, a feat she didn`t even know was possible.  But can Kohei handle frying foods without burning them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day Off and Special Doughnuts
Jour de repos et donuts spéciaux
Oyasumi no Hi no Tokubetsu Doughnut
お休みの日のとくべつドーナッツ
